casebody.data:
TOWN OF EAST HAMPTON, NEW YORK, petitioner,
v.
FRIENDS OF THE EAST HAMPTON AIRPORT, INC., et al. No. 16-1070. Supreme Court of the United States June 26, 2017.

Motion of Committee to Stop Airport Expansion, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
